text: Only USC and GC apply for this role

text.10: Describe the required must have technical skills, tools, or experience:
text.11: Coding using either *Python and Pandas OR *Python and Spark
text.12: Is there any skills you are willing to flex on if a candidate does not have it? No
text.13: Tell me about some soft skills that would make a candidate successful in this role:
text.15: Does this position require any degrees or certifications for the candidate to be successful?
text.16: 6+ years' experience and degree required - Computer Science or Engineering degree is required
text.17: Are there 2-3 screening questions that suppliers can ask prior to submittal and submit with the candidate=E2=80=99s resume that would provide insight on their fit for this role?
text.18: Have you had experience with Python and Pandas, or Python and Spark combined?
text.19: How comfortable are you in using core Python and Pandas?
text.21: Describe what is different about this specific role compared to others hiring for the same skill set?
text.22: This is a small team that works closely together to utilizes strategy in regulatory efforts for bank reserving and capital processes.
